hero.name: Mohamed Gamal Sedeek
hero.title: Software & Data Engineer
hero.subtitle: Building enterprise-grade systems with .NET, data engineering, and cloud technologies
hero.description: Results-oriented engineer with 10+ years of proven success in .NET development, data engineering, and cloud-based enterprise systems. Expert in software architecture, API design, and ETL pipelines.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Results-oriented Software and Data Engineer with over 10 years of proven success in .NET development, data engineering, and cloud-based enterprise systems.
paragraphs: Expert in software architecture, API design, and ETL pipelines using C#, SQL Server, SSIS, Kafka, and .NET Core. Adept at delivering scalable, high-performance solutions integrating legacy and modern systems across enterprise, judicial, and governmental sectors.

Demonstrates strong proficiency in database design, data warehousing, and real-time streaming architectures using Kafka, Debezium, and PostgreSQL. Skilled in containerization and DevOps practices with Docker, Kubernetes, and Helm.

Recognized for technical leadership, Agile collaboration, and ability to drive continuous improvement in complex software ecosystems. Committed to innovation, maintainability, and data-driven performance optimization to achieve measurable business outcomes.

items.title: Integration Service (Courts ‚Üî G2G)
items.description: Designed SOA architecture with WCF and SQL Server 2012 for real-time synchronization between heterogeneous court systems. Unified data formats with secure communication and encryption for rapid data retrieval.

items.title: Complaints Management System (MOJ)
items.description: Built centralized web application using ASP.NET Core for complaint handling with automated workflows and notifications. Reduced manual processing by 45% with role-based access and real-time analytics.

items.title: Data Warehouse & ETL System
items.description: Designed SSIS-based ETL pipelines aggregating data from multiple sources into SQL Server data warehouse. Enabled Power BI and OBIEE dashboards reducing manual reporting by 50%.

items.title: SPARROW-INN Hotel Management
items.description: Developed multi-tenant SaaS solution using ASP.NET MVC and SQL Server 2016 with dynamic pricing, reservation, and billing modules. Deployed in cloud with automated scaling and 24/7 availability.

items.title: Judicial Portal & Statistics System
items.description: Created ASP.NET dashboards consolidating judicial statistics nationwide. Automated data collection reducing manual effort by over 50% with high availability and failover support.

items.title: Real-time CDC Pipeline (Kafka + Debezium)
items.description: Built distributed CDC pipeline from PostgreSQL to MongoDB using Debezium and Kafka, processing 10K records/min with Python consumers. Implemented event-driven microservices handling 5K messages/sec.
Working on integration between WPF desktop applications and web-based systems. Developing and maintaining backend solutions using .NET Core and .NET Framework 4.8.
achievements: Designed and implemented Web APIs for secure data exchange
Optimized SQL Server performance for high-volume data processing
Enhanced system architecture and web-service integration

items.description: Designed end-to-end enterprise systems from requirements to deployment. Built data pipelines and ETL workflows integrating court systems into centralized databases.
achievements: Developed APIs and microservices for Ministry of Justice portal
Implemented real-time case-tracking and reporting functionality
Led Agile sprints and mentored junior engineers
Optimized SQL Server schemas improving performance by 300%

items.description: Gathered requirements and delivered maintainable .NET applications. Designed relational database structures and enhanced data performance.
achievements: Built multiple enterprise applications for judicial operations
Conducted code reviews, debugging, and unit testing
Provided post-implementation support and comprehensive documentation
Improved database performance through optimization techniques

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
